reporting_cycle: The Secretary-General reports every three months
summary:
17. Reaffirms the obligation to implement international humanitarian law, particularly protecting humanitarian personnel.

18. Takes note of Chad's efforts to prevent child recruitment and use by armed groups.

19. Urges the donor community to address Chad and the Central African Republic's humanitarian, reconstruction, and development needs.

20. Requests the Secretary-General to report regularly on the security and humanitarian situation.

21. Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
